name: Assembly Lines & You
landing_text: This is Assembly Line Machines, a complete reimagining of Minecraft's technological side. This walkthrough will help you understand and work through this mod from start to end.$(li)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/assemblylinemachines)CurseForge$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://github.com/HaydenBelanger/assemblylinemachines/issues)GitHub Issue Tracker$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://assemblylinemachines.haydenb.me/en/latest/)Developer Wiki$(/l)
